I'm running JUnit from IntelliJ.  When reviewing the JUnit stack trace, I
noticed that only those files compiled directly by IntelliJ showed line
numbers,   For those classes that I compiled by running my own Ant file
(instead of IntelliJ's built-in compiler), I get "Unknown Source" in place
of a line number.

Any ideas as to why this is happening?  Am I missing something in my Ant
file?  Is my IntelliJ configured differently so that it produces this extra
information?

--Randy
subject: line numbers vs "Source Unknown"  (JUnit on IntelliJ)
